msg_pokecen_kaifuku_01_01:
Good morning, and welcome to the Pokémon
Center! Do your precious Pokémon need a rest?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_01_02:
Hello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center!
Are your Pokémon tired and in need of rest?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_01_03:
Welcome to the Pokémon Center! Still up and
about? Are you here to rest your tired Pokémon?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_01_04:
[BD06:0]Morning, Champion [trnm:0]!
Here\r
to\r
let\r
your\r
precious\r
Pokémon rest?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_01_05:
[BD06:0]Hello, Champion [trnm:0]!
Here\r
to\r
let\r
your\r
tired\r
Pokémon rest?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_01_06:
[BD06:0]You’re up so late, Champion
[trnm:0]!\r
You\r
here\r
to\r
let\r
your\r
weary\r
Pokémon\r
rest?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_select_01: I’d like to heal my Pokémon
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_select_02: I don’t know where to go...
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_02_02: Then we’ll need your Pokémon for a few seconds!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_02_05:
[BD06:0][pknm:0] and the rest of
your\r
team\r
should\r
be all\r
better now!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_02_04: Come back and see us again whenever you need!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_02_06:
Oh, and I went ahead and charged up your
Tera Orb too.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_04_01:
Right! Let’s see—if I had to recommend a next
destination for you...
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_20a:
I’d guess a fresh-faced student belongs in school!\c
Head to Naranja Academy, why don’t you?
You must be excited to join your class!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_20b:
I’d guess a fresh-faced student belongs in school!\c
Head to Uva Academy, why don’t you? You must
be excited to join your class!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_21a:
I’d guess there are still corners of the academy
you haven’t checked out.\c
Don’t be afraid to visit different rooms—
who knows who you’ll end up meeting!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_21b:
I’d guess there are still corners of the academy
you haven’t checked out.\c
Don’t be afraid to go into different rooms—
who knows who you’ll end up meeting!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_00:
...Nope! Sorry, I’ve got nothing!\c
You’re ready for anything Paldea could possibly
throw at you, so I’d say go wherever you’d like!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_01:
You should pay a visit to the Cortondo Gym!\c
Have you considered trying to take on Gym
Leader Katy in charming Cortondo?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_02:
I’d recommend the Artazon Gym!\c
Have you thought about taking on Gym Leader
Brassius? He’s in picturesque Artazon!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_03:
Well, how about the Cascarrafa Gym?\c
You could try taking on Gym Leader Kofu in
refreshing Cascarrafa!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_04:
I’d aim for the Levincia Gym!\c
You could try challenging Gym Leader Iono in
the dazzling city of Levincia!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_05:
I think you’d better visit the Medali Gym!\c
You could try taking on Gym Leader Larry next.
You’ll find him in good old Medali.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_06:
I’d say it’s time for the Glaseado Gym.\c
What do you think of challenging Gym Leader
Grusha up on Glaseado Mountain?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_07:
I think you should try the Montenevera Gym next.\c
You could try challenging Gym Leader Ryme
in chilly Montenevera!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_08:
I’d say, how about the Alfornada Gym?\c
Have you considered taking on Gym Leader Tulip
in scorching Alfornada?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_09:
I’d say make for the lair of the Rock-type Titan!\c
Why not try to seek out the Pokémon known as
the Stony Cliff Titan?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_10:
I’d say make for the lair of the Steel-type Titan!\c
Maybe try seeking out the Pokémon known as
the Lurking Steel Titan?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_11:
I’d say make for the lair of the Flying-type Titan!\c
Think you might be up to seeking out the
so-called Open Sky Titan?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_12:
I’d say make for the lair of the Ground-type Titan!\c
Do you dare seek out the Pokémon that has been
called the Quaking Earth Titan?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_13:
I’d say make for the lair of the Dragon-type Titan!\c
Why not seek out the Pokémon called the
False Dragon Titan?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_14:
It’d be the base of Team Star’s Fairy crew!\c
Ortega, the boss of the Ruchbah Squad, would
probably welcome a challenge, from what I hear.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_15:
It’d be the base of Team Star’s Dark crew!\c
I hear Giacomo, the boss of the Segin Squad,
is just waiting for someone to battle.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_16:
It’d be the base of Team Star’s Fire crew!\c
Seems like Mela, the boss of the Schedar Squad,
is burning for someone to battle against.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_17:
It’d be the base of Team Star’s Poison crew!\c
Atticus, the boss of the Navi Squad, is apparently
waiting for someone to battle.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_18:
It’d be the base of Team Star’s Fighting crew!\c
I’m pretty sure Eri, the boss of the Caph Squad,
could use a good challenge in battle.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_hint_19:
Go to Area Zero in the Great Crater of Paldea!\c
I think you’ve got some tried-and-true friends
waiting for you there.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_04_02:
I’ll go ahead and mark the spot in your map app
for you.
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_04_03:
You’ve got a destination set in your map app
already. Is it OK if I replace it with this one?
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_04_04:
All right...you’re all set! Go out there and have
an adventure—we’ll be here when you need us!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_04_05:
All righty—I’ll leave your map be! Have fun
exploring, and we’ll be here when you need us!
msg_pokecen_kaifuku_03_02:
Feliz cumpleaños! Congratulations on your
birthday!\c
I do hope you keep visiting the Pokémon Center
for many years to come!\c
Now, are you here to let your Pokémon rest?
msg_pokecen_birthday_02:
I do hope this will be a wonderful year for you—
each and every day!
msg_pokecen_birthday_03:
Oh, today is a special day, isn’t it?\c
I know it’s actually a day early, but we wish you
a very happy birthday!
msg_common_gameover_pc_01: First, let’s restore your Pokémon to full health.
msg_common_gameover_pc_02_01:
Be sure to visit a Pokémon Center whenever your
Pokémon [is;are:n] running low on HP.\c
And if you’re planning to go far off the beaten
path, you should probably remember to stock\r
up on Potions from the Poké Mart, too.\c
Good luck out there, Trainer!
msg_common_gameover_pc_02_02:
Your Pokémon [is;are:n] all happy and healthy again!
Good luck out there, and take care!
msg_common_mama_01:
Study hard and play hard, that’s what I say!
You should enjoy your days as a student.[npcn:2B]
msg_common_gameover_mama_01:
[BD06:0]Oh, good to have you home,
[trnm:0]!\c
Your Pokémon [is;are:n] looking a bit weary, though.
Why don’t you have a nice rest together?\c
... ... ...
... ... ...[npcn:2B]
msg_common_gameover_mama_02:
There you are! A nice long nap is all a body
needs to feel ready for more adventure, right?\c
Doesn’t matter whether you’re a person or a
Pokémon—we all need to take time to rest.[npcn:2B]
msg_pokecen_set_birth_01:
[BD06:0]Certainly! Allow me to get your birthday
registered in our system,\r
[trnm:0]!
msg_pokecen_set_birth_02:
Now, do be careful you enter it right. You can’t
change your birthday after it’s registered.
msg_pokecen_set_birth_03:
So I’ve got here a birthday of [num2:1]/[num2:2] for one
M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0]. Is that right?
msg_pokecen_set_birth_04:
Thanks for registering your birthday with the
Pokémon Center!
msg_pokecen_set_birth_05:
You should stop by on your big day, too!
We’ll be expecting you on [num2:1]/[num2:2]!
msg_pokecen_set_birth_06:
Oh, and if your very special birthday isn’t on the
calendar this year, then please come on 2/28!
msg_pokecen_tips_introduction_00: Oh! By the way—did you know...?
msg_pokecen_tips_introduction_01:
Or did you already know that? Well, I do hope
my little tidbits come in handy!
msg_pokecen_tips_introduction_02:
With all the little tidbits that I’ve shared with you
so far, [trnm:0]...\c
you should now know just about everything you
need as you go adventuring!\c
Flip back through your Adventure Guide from
time to time, though, as you enjoy exploring!
msg_pokecen_tips_introduction_03:
Now that you have a Hall of Fame Badge,
I’ve unlocked the Judge function for you.
